attributes.action: stop the proposal for mineral extraction at Bridgham and Harling Norfolk
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Minerals and Waste local plans have identified Manor Farm Bridgham (adjacent to residential properties of eastern Bridgham) and a large area of Forestry Commission Land at West Harling. Bridgham is the only proposed site in Norfolk to be so close to a village centre.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "stop the proposal for mineral extraction at Bridgham and Harling Norfolk."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15502.asp

Prime Minister's Office
